metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32763 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.1. When a SVG file with an image inside it is rendered, a QTextLayout buffer overflow can be triggered.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
